spinehx.AnimationState

type
class
Stores state for an animation and automatically mixes between animations.

Constructor

new(data : AnimationStateData)

Instance Methods

addAnimation(animation : Animation, loop : Bool, delay : Float) : Void

parameters
delay May be <= 0 to use duration of previous animation minus any mix duration plus the negative delay.
Adds an animation to be played delay seconds after the current or last queued animation.

addAnimationByName(animationName : String, loop : Bool, delay : Float) : Void

see
#addAnimation(Animation, boolean, float)

addAnimationByNameSimple(animationName : String, loop : Bool) : Void

see
#addAnimation(Animation, boolean)

addAnimationSimple(animation : Animation, loop : Bool) : Void

Adds an animation to be played delay seconds after the current or last queued animation, taking into account any mix duration.

apply(skeleton : Skeleton) : Void

clearAnimation() : Void

clearQueue() : Void

getAnimation() : Animation

returns
May be null.

getData() : AnimationStateData

getTime() : Float

Returns the time within the current animation.

isComplete() : Bool

Returns true if no animation is set or if the current time is greater than the animation duration, regardless of looping.

setAnimation(animation : Animation, loop : Bool) : Void

parameters
animation May be null.
Set the current animation. Any queued animations are cleared and the current animation time is set to 0.

setAnimationByName(animationName : String, loop : Bool) : Void

see
#setAnimation(Animation, boolean)

setTime(time : Float) : Void

toString() : String

update(delta : Float) : Void
